name: Boxes (CPUGuy)
description:
My puzzle game finally released!! Boxes is a game that features YOU!!!

Your job is to push boxes around... But that is not just it!

Featuring: 

5 different boxes!!!

39 levels!!!

5 chapters!!!

Robert Willis!!!

1-4 hours of gameplay!!!

A secret?

Discover now by playing Boxes!!!

If that didn't convince you yet, check out the demo! That will change your mind.

https://cpuguy.itch.io/boxes
